segments.text: Just next to the boy, a little girl is standing on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's looking up at him, her whole body attentive and expectant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One arm is raised, her palm open, as if she's waiting for her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s clear she’s a willing accomplice in this little operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a sweet, hopeful look on her face, almost like she's wishing for a miracle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not touching the stool, thankfully, so she's not adding to its instability.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm a bit surprised by their teamwork; they've clearly done this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amusing how quietly they're going about this, creating their own little secret.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught, or worse, cause an accident with that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It would be a shame if all this effort led to a scolding and no cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman is completely oblivious, though, absorbed in her dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bold move they're making, quite frankly, with so much happening around them.
segments.speaker: PAR
